documentation.text: @dev Defines methods for nest governance contract
@dev Defines methods for nest governance contract

devdoc.details: Defines methods for nest governance contract

checkGovernance(address,uint256).details: Check whether the target address has governance rights for the given target

params.flag: Permission weight. The permission of the target address must be greater than this weight to pass the check

getBuiltinAddress().details: Set the built-in contract address of the system

returns._0: Weight. 0 means to delete the governance permission of the target address. Weight is not         implemented in the current system, only the difference between authorized and unauthorized.         Here, a uint96 is used to represent the weight, which is only reserved for expansion

getNestNodeAddress().details: Get address of nest node contract

getNestTokenAddress().details: Get address of nest token contract

registerAddress(string,address).details: Registered address. The address registered here is the address accepted by nest system

params.addr: Destination address. 0 means to delete the registration information

setBuiltinAddress(address,address,addres.details: Set the built-in contract address of the system

params.flag: Weight. 0 means to delete the governance permission of the target address. Weight is not         implemented in the current system, only the difference between authorized and unauthorized.         Here, a uint96 is used to represent the weight, which is only reserved for expansion
